title: Thor Love & Thunder Trailer Reaction & Breakdown
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order.

Tim, Nick, Andy, and Kevin react to the Marvel Studios MCU Thor 4 Love And Thunder movie trailer and then do a frame-by-frame breakdown analysis and analyze it!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
